title.rendered: “Honoring the Fallen: Remembering IDF Heroes and Their Sacrifice”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the names of seven IDF fallen soldiers whose families have been notified: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC1606202473684

A link is attached to the IDF website, where the details and photos of the fallen soldiers are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

During the incident in which Captain (Res.) Itan Koplovitz, may his memory be a blessing, and Staff Sergeant (Res.) Eilon Weiss, may his memory be a blessing, fell, two fighters from Combat Battalion 129, Brigade 8 were severely injured. The fighters were evacuated to receive medical treatment at the hospital, and their families were updated.
